mapper.sql: SELECT a.*, (SELECT username FROM sa_user WHERE guid = a.owneruser) ownerusername FROM bi_searchcondition a
mapper.select:
where userproductboguid is null and a.guid=#GUID# and a.conditionname=#CONDITIONNAME# and a.owneruser=#OWNERUSER# and a.isusersaved=#ISUSERSAVED# and a.firstcondition=#FIRSTCONDITION# and a.secondcondition=#SECONDCONDITION# and a.createuserguid=#CREATEUSERGUID# and trunc(a.createtime) = trunc(#CREATETIME#) and a.updateuserguid=#UPDATEUSERGUID# and trunc(a.updatetime) = trunc(#UPDATETIME#)
and a.classguid is null and a.classguid=#CLASSGUID#
and a.classification=#CLASSIFICATION# and a.folderguid=#FOLDERGUID# and a.isobsonly=#ISOBSONLY# and a.hassubfolders=#HASSUBFOLDERS# and a.isadvanced=#ISADVANCED# and a.casesensitive=#CASESENSITIVE# and a.isowneronly=#ISOWNERONLY# and a.isownergrouponly=#ISOWNERGROUPONLY# and a.MODELINTERFACEENUM=#MODELINTERFACEENUM# and a.BOMTEMPLATEID=#BOMTEMPLATEID# and a.bomtemplateid=#BOMTEMPLATEID# and a.relationtemplateid=#RELATIONTEMPLATEID# and a.USERPRODUCTBOGUID=#USERPRODUCTBOGUID# and a.searchrevisiontype=#SEARCHREVISIONTYPE# and a.PARENTGUID=#PARENTGUID# and a.ISCHECKOUTONLY=#ISCHECKOUTONLY# and a.ISSHOWHIDEDATA=#ISSHOWHIDEDATA# and a.pmtype=#PMTYPE# and a.querytype=#QUERYTYPE#
select count(1) cn from bi_searchcondition t where t.isusersaved = '3' and t.conditionname = #CONDITIONNAME#
select count(1) cn from bi_searchcondition t where t.isusersaved = '2' and t.conditionname = #CONDITIONNAME# and t.createuserguid = #USERGUID#
select count(1) cn from bi_searchcondition t where t.conditionname = #CONDITIONNAME# and t.pmtype = #PMTYPE#
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO bi_searchcondition ( guid, parentguid, conditionname, owneruser, isusersaved, firstcondition, secondcondition, createuserguid, createtime, updateuserguid, updatetime, classguid, classification, folderguid, isobsonly, hassubfolders, isadvanced, casesensitive, isowneronly, modelinterfaceenum, bomtemplateid, relationtemplateid, userproductboguid, searchrevisiontype, ischeckoutonly, isownergrouponly, isshowhidedata, pmtype, querytype ) VALUES( #GUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #PARENTGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CONDITIONNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OWNERUSER:VARCHAR:NULL#, '1', #ISUSERSAVED#, #FIRSTCONDITION:VARCHAR:NULL#, #SECONDCONDITION:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CLASSGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CLASSIFICATION:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FOLDERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, 'N', #ISOBSONLY#,
'N', #HASSUBFOLDERS#,
'Y', #ISADVANCED#,
'N', #CASESENSITIVE#,
'N', #ISOWNERONLY#,
#MODELINTERFACEENUM:VARCHAR:NULL#, #BOMTEMPLATEID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #RELATIONTEMPLATEID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #USERPRODUCTBOGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #SEARCHREVISIONTYPE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ISCHECKOUTONLY:VARCHAR:NULL#,
'N', #ISOWNERGROUPONLY#,
'N', #ISSHOWHIDEDATA#,
#PMTYPE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #QUERYTYPE# '2' )
mapper.update:
update bi_searchcondition
updatetime=#CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#,updateuserguid=#UPDATEUSERGUID# conditionname=#CONDITIONNAME#, owneruser=#OWNERUSER#, isusersaved=#ISUSERSAVED#, firstcondition=#FIRSTCONDITION#, secondcondition=#SECONDCONDITION#, classguid=#CLASSGUID#, classification=#CLASSIFICATION#, folderguid=#FOLDERGUID#, isobsonly=#ISOBSONLY#, hassubfolders=#HASSUBFOLDERS#, isadvanced=#ISADVANCED#, casesensitive=#CASESENSITIVE#, isowneronly=#ISOWNERONLY#, isownergrouponly=#ISOWNERGROUPONLY#, MODELINTERFACEENUM=#MODELINTERFACEENUM#, bomtemplateid=#BOMTEMPLATEID#, relationtemplateid=#RELATIONTEMPLATEID#, USERPRODUCTBOGUID=#USERPRODUCTBOGUID#, SEARCHREVISIONTYPE=#SEARCHREVISIONTYPE#, ISCHECKOUTONLY=#ISCHECKOUTONLY#, PARENTGUID=#PARENTGUID#, ISSHOWHIDEDATA=#ISSHOWHIDEDATA#, pmtype=#PMTYPE#, querytype=#QUERYTYPE#,
where guid = #GUID# and updatetime = #UPDATETIME:TIMESTAMP#
